Hi there!
I’m Zachary Espiritu. I’m currently studying Computer Science at Brown University.

Right now, I’m a TA for CSCI0040, a course on scientific computing in Python and Matlab. Previously, I interned at Negotiatus where I automated data-intensive processes and developed several client-facing interfaces. This summer, I’ll be doing research in Brown’s PLT Group.
